propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports both default and custom theme colors, which can be added as shown in the palette customization guide.
propDescriptions.disableAnimation: If true, the transition animation is disabled.
propDescriptions.disabled: If true, the label should be displayed in a disabled state.
propDescriptions.error: If true, the label is displayed in an error state.
propDescriptions.focused: If true, the input of this label is focused (used by FormGroup components).
propDescriptions.margin: If dense, will adjust vertical spacing. This is normally obtained via context from FormControl.
propDescriptions.required: If true, the label will indicate that the input is required.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
